title: Extinguished Hope
description: The horror of Bindoon Boy's School was uncovered by Margaret Humphrey's in Oranges and Sunshine: Empty Cradles. Extinguished Hope is the true story that gives a voice to one Australian child whose mother paid the Brothers for a years school to help him read, and the pain of the man he became, forever damaged by his treatment at the school. In memory of all the children scarred by their time at the school - Michael recounts his desperate attempts to have someone believe his terrible story.
author: Kendra Bell-Hayes
